author: Staff Reporter
text:
A physically challenged woman K. Kalaiarasi (45) has made an earnest appeal to the district administration for a three-wheeler scooter to aid her in travel and to restore her livelihood. Hailing from a economically poor background, Kalaiarasi said here on Tuesday that five years ago she had worked in companies making artificial flowers, incense sticks and processing seafood. She said she had managed to reach the worksites to earn her livelihood in the companies’ vehicles. But, since such vehicle operations had been suspended, she could hardly access any workplace at present, she added. Ms. Kalaiarasi said her house at Samypuram in Mullakadu was completely damaged in the monsoon rains and even lost her family card.

Having lost her husband in an accident 16 years ago, she said she was now was living with her 17-year-old son and 92-year-old mother. Considering her economic situation, the authorities concerned should sanction her the vehicle, she said. A petition to this effect was submitted to Collector M. Ravikumar on Monday, she said.
title: Physically challenged woman seeks aid
